verses.verse: Now<WG1161> a certain<WG5100> man was<WG2258> sick,<WG770> Lazarus<WG2976> from Bethany,<WG963> of the village<WG2968> of<WG575> Mary<WG3137> and<WG2532> her<WG846> sister,<WG79> Martha.<WG1537>

It was<WG2258> that Mary<WG3137> who<WG3588> had anointed<WG218> the Lord<WG2962> with<WG2359> ointment,<WG3464> and<WG2532> wiped<WG1591> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> with<WG2359> her<WG846> hair,<WG2359> whose<WG3739> brother,<WG80> Lazarus,<WG2976> was sick.<WG770>
The sisters<WG79> therefore<WG3767> sent<WG649> to<WG4314> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "Lord,<WG2962> behold,<WG1492> he for whom<WG3739> you have great affection<WG5368> is sick.<WG770>"

But when<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> heard<WG191> it,<WG2036> he said, "This<WG3778> sickness<WG769> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> to<WG4314> death,<WG2288> but<WG235> for<WG5228> the glory<WG1391> of God,<WG2316> that<WG2443> God<WG2316>'s Son<WG5207> may be glorified<WG1392> by it.<WG846>"
Now<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> loved<WG25> Martha,<WG3136> and<WG2532> her<WG846> sister,<WG79> and<WG2532> Lazarus.<WG2976>
When<WG5613> therefore<WG3767> he heard<WG191> that<WG3754> he was sick,<WG770> he stayed<WG3306> two<WG1417> days<WG2250><WG99999> in<WG1722> the place<WG3739> where<WG5117> he was.<WG3303>
Then<WG1899> after<WG3326> this<WG5124> he<WG3004> said to<WG3101> the disciples,<WG3101> "Let<WG71>'s go into<WG1519> Judea<WG1519> again.<WG3825>"

The disciples<WG3101> told<WG3004> him,<WG846> "Rabbi,<WG4461> the Jews<WG2453> were just<WG3568> trying<WG2212> to stone<WG3034> you,<WG4571> and<WG2532> are you<WG5217> going there<WG1563> again?<WG3825>"

Jesus<WG2424> answered,<WG611> "Aren't<WG3780> there<WG1526> twelve<WG1427> hours<WG5610> of daylight?<WG2250> If<WG1437> a man<WG5100> walks<WG4043> in<WG1722> the day,<WG2250> he doesn't<WG3756> stumble,<WG4350> because<WG3754> he sees<WG991> the light<WG5457> of<WG2889> this<WG5127> world.<WG2889>
But<WG1161> if<WG1437> a man<WG5100> walks<WG4043> in<WG1722> the night,<WG3571> he stumbles,<WG4350> because<WG3754> the light<WG5457><WG99999> isn't<WG3756> in<WG1722> him.<WG846>"

He<WG2036> said these things,<WG5023> and<WG2532> after<WG3326> that,<WG5124> he said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Our<WG2257> friend,<WG5384> Lazarus,<WG2976> has fallen asleep,<WG2837> but<WG235> I am going<WG4198> so that<WG2443> I may awake<WG1852> him<WG846> out of sleep.<WG1852>"
The<WG846> disciples<WG3101> therefore<WG3767> said,<WG2036> "Lord,<WG2962> if<WG1487> he has fallen asleep,<WG2837> he will recover.<WG4982>"

Now<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> had spoken<WG2046> of<WG4012> his<WG846> death,<WG2288> but<WG1161> they<WG1565> thought<WG1380> that<WG3754> he spoke<WG3004> of<WG4012> taking rest<WG2838> in sleep.<WG5258>
So Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to them<WG846> plainly<WG3954> then,<WG5119> "Lazarus<WG2976> is dead.<WG3767>

I<WG2532> am glad<WG5463> for<WG1223> your sakes<WG5209> that<WG2443> I was<WG2252> not<WG3756> there,<WG1563> so that<WG3754> you may believe.<WG4100> Nevertheless,<WG235> let<WG71>'s go to<WG4314> him.<WG846>"

Thomas<WG2381> therefore,<WG3767> who is called<WG3004> Didymus,<WG1324> said<WG2036> to his fellow disciples,<WG4827> "Let<WG71>'s <WG2249> go<WG71> also,<WG2532> that<WG2443> we may die<WG599> with<WG3326> him.<WG846>"
So when<WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> came,<WG2064> he<WG846> found that<WG2147> he had<WG2192> been in<WG1722> the tomb<WG3419> four<WG5064> days<WG2250> already.<WG2235>
Now<WG1161> Bethany<WG963> was<WG2258> near<WG1451> Jerusalem,<WG2414> about<WG5613> fifteen<WG1178> stadia<WG4712> away.<WG575>

<WG2532> Many<WG4183> of<WG1537> the Jews<WG2453> had joined<WG2064> the women around<WG4012> Martha<WG3136> and<WG2532> Mary,<WG3137> to<WG4012> console<WG3888> them<WG846> concerning<WG4012> their<WG846> brother.<WG4314>

Then<WG3767> when<WG5613> Martha<WG3136> heard<WG191> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> was coming,<WG2064> she went and met<WG5221> him,<WG846> but<WG1161> Mary<WG3137> stayed<WG2516> in<WG1722> the house.<WG3624>

Therefore<WG3767> Martha<WG3136> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> Jesus,<WG2424> "Lord,<WG2962> if<WG1487> you would have been<WG2258> here,<WG5602> my<WG3450> brother<WG80> wouldn't<WG3756> have<WG2348> died.<WG302>
Even<WG235> now<WG3568> I know<WG1492> that,<WG3754> whatever<WG3745> you ask<WG154> of God,<WG2316> God<WG2316> will give<WG1325> you.<WG302>"
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to her,<WG846> "Your<WG4675> brother<WG80> will rise again.<WG450>"
Martha<WG3136> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "I know<WG1492> that<WG3754> he will rise again<WG450> in<WG1722> the resurrection<WG386> at<WG1722> the last<WG2078> day.<WG2250>"

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to her,<WG846> "I<WG1473> am<WG1510> the resurrection<WG386> and<WG2532> the life.<WG2222> He who believes<WG4100> in<WG1519> me<WG1691> will still<WG2579> live,<WG2198> even if<WG2579> he dies.<WG599>
<WG2532> Whoever<WG3956> lives<WG2198> and<WG2532> believes<WG4100> in<WG1519> me<WG1691> will<WG599> never<WG3756> die.<WG599> Do you<WG4100> believe this?<WG165>"

She said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Yes,<WG3483> Lord.<WG2962> I<WG1473> have come to believe<WG4100> that<WG3754> you<WG4771> are<WG1488> the Christ,<WG5547> God<WG2316>'s Son,<WG5207> he who comes<WG2064> into<WG1519> the world.<WG2889>"

When<WG2532> she had<WG2036> said<WG2036> this,<WG5023> she went away,<WG565> and<WG2532> called<WG5455> Mary,<WG3137> her<WG846> sister,<WG79> secretly,<WG2977> saying,<WG2036> "The Teacher<WG1320> is here,<WG3918> and<WG2532> is calling<WG5455> you.<WG4571>"
When<WG5613> she<WG1565> heard<WG191> this,<WG1453> she arose quickly,<WG5035> and<WG2532> went<WG2064> to<WG4314> him.<WG846>

Now<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> had<WG2064> not yet<WG3768> come<WG2064> into<WG1519> the village,<WG2968> but<WG235> was<WG2258> in<WG1722> the place<WG5117> where<WG3699> Martha<WG3136> met<WG5221> him.<WG846>

Then<WG3767> the Jews<WG2453> who were<WG5607> with<WG3326> her<WG846> in<WG1722> the house,<WG3614> and<WG2532> were<WG5607> consoling<WG3888> her,<WG846> when they saw<WG1492> Mary,<WG3137> that<WG3754> she rose up<WG450> quickly and<WG2532> went out,<WG1831> followed<WG190> her,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> "She is going<WG5217> to<WG1519> the tomb<WG3419> to<WG2443> weep<WG2799> there.<WG3754>"

Therefore<WG3767> when<WG5613> Mary<WG3137> came<WG2064> to where<WG3699> Jesus<WG2424> was,<WG2258> and saw<WG1492> him,<WG846> she fell down<WG4098> at<WG1519> his<WG846> feet,<WG4228> saying<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Lord,<WG2962> if<WG1487> you would have been<WG2258> here,<WG5602> my<WG3450> brother<WG80> wouldn't<WG3756> have<WG599> died.<WG302>"

When<WG5613> Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> saw<WG1492> her<WG846> weeping,<WG2799> and<WG2532> the Jews<WG2453><WG99999> weeping<WG2799> who came<WG4905> with her,<WG846> he<WG1438> groaned<WG1690> in the spirit,<WG4151> and<WG2532> was troubled,<WG5015>
and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> "Where<WG4226> have you laid<WG5087> him?<WG846>" They told<WG3004> him,<WG846> "Lord,<WG2962> come<WG2064> and<WG2532> see.<WG1492>"
Jesus<WG2424> wept.<WG1145>
The Jews<WG2453> therefore<WG3767> said,<WG3004> "See<WG1492> how<WG4459> much affection<WG5368> he had for him!<WG846>"

<WG5100> Some<WG5100> of<WG1537> them<WG846> said,<WG2036> "Couldn't<WG1410> <WG3756> this man,<WG3778> who opened<WG455> the eyes<WG3788> of him who<WG2443> was blind,<WG5185> have also<WG2532> kept<WG4160> this<WG2443> man<WG3778> from<WG3361> dying?<WG599>"

Jesus<WG2424> therefore,<WG3767> again<WG3825> groaning<WG1690> in<WG1722> himself,<WG1438> came<WG2064> to<WG1519> the tomb.<WG3419> Now it was<WG2258> a cave,<WG4693> and<WG2532> a stone<WG3037> lay<WG1945> against<WG1909> it.<WG1161>

Jesus<WG2424> said,<WG3004> "Take away<WG142> the stone.<WG3037>" Martha,<WG3136> the sister<WG79> of him who was dead,<WG2348> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Lord,<WG2962> by this time<WG2235> there is a stench,<WG3605> for<WG1063> he has been<WG2076> dead four days.<WG5066>"
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to her,<WG846> "Didn't<WG3756> I<WG2036> tell you<WG4671> that<WG3754> if<WG1437> you believed,<WG4100> you would see<WG3700> God<WG2316>'s glory?<WG1391>"

So<WG3767> they took away<WG142> the stone<WG3037> from the place where<WG3757> the dead<WG2348> man was<WG2258> lying.<WG2749> <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> lifted<WG142> up<WG507> his eyes,<WG3788> and<WG2532> said,<WG2036> "Father,<WG3962> I thank<WG2168> you<WG4671> that<WG3754> you listened<WG191> to me.<WG3450>

<WG1161> I<WG1473> know<WG1492> that<WG3754> you always<WG3842> listen<WG191> to me,<WG3450> but<WG235> because of<WG1223> the multitude<WG3793> that stands around<WG4026> I said<WG2036> this,<WG2443> that they may believe<WG4100> that<WG3754> you<WG4771> sent<WG649> me.<WG3165>"
When<WG2532> he<WG2036> had said<WG2036> this,<WG5023> he cried<WG2905> with a<WG5456> loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> "Lazarus,<WG2976> come<WG1204> out!<WG1854>"

He<WG2532> who was dead<WG2348> came out,<WG1831> bound<WG1210> hand<WG5495> and<WG2532> foot<WG4228> with<WG1210> wrappings,<WG2750> and<WG2532> his<WG846> face<WG3799> was wrapped around with<WG4019> a cloth.<WG4676> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Free<WG3089> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> let him<WG863> go.<WG5217>"

Therefore<WG3767> many<WG4183> of<WG1537> the Jews,<WG2453> who came<WG2064> to<WG4314> Mary<WG3137> and<WG2532> saw<WG2300> what<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> did,<WG4160> believed<WG4100> in<WG1519> him.<WG846>
But<WG1161> some<WG5100> of<WG1537> them<WG846> went away<WG565> to<WG4314> the Pharisees,<WG5330> and<WG2532> told<WG2036> them<WG846> the things<WG3739> which Jesus<WG2424> had done.<WG4160>

The chief priests<WG749> therefore<WG3767> and<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> gathered<WG4863> a council,<WG4892> and<WG2532> said,<WG3004> "What<WG5101> are we<WG4160> doing?<WG3754> For this<WG3778> man<WG444> does<WG4160> many<WG4183> signs.<WG4592>

If<WG1437> we leave<WG863> him<WG846> alone<WG3779> like this,<WG3956> everyone will believe<WG4100> in<WG1519> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> the Romans<WG4514> will come<WG2064> and<WG2532> take away<WG142> both<WG2532> our<WG2257> place<WG5117> and<WG2532> our nation.<WG1484>"

But<WG1161> a certain one<WG1520> of<WG1537> them,<WG846> Caiaphas,<WG2533> being<WG5607> high priest<WG749> that<WG1565> year,<WG1763> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "You<WG5210> know<WG1492> nothing<WG3756> at all,<WG5100>

nor<WG3761> do you consider<WG1260> that<WG3754> it is advantageous<WG4851> for us<WG2254> that<WG2443> one<WG1520> man<WG444> should die<WG599> for<WG5228> the people,<WG2992> and<WG2532> that<WG2443> the whole<WG3650> nation<WG1484> not<WG3361> perish.<WG622>"

Now<WG1161> he<WG2036> didn't<WG3756> say this<WG5124> of<WG575> himself,<WG1438> but<WG235> being<WG5607> high priest<WG749> that<WG1565> year,<WG1763> he prophesied<WG4395> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> would<WG3195> die<WG599> for<WG5228> the nation,<WG1484>

and<WG2532> not<WG3756> for<WG5228> the nation<WG1484> only,<WG3440> but<WG235> that<WG2443> he might also<WG2532> gather together<WG4863> into<WG1519> one<WG1520> the children<WG5043> of God<WG2316> who are scattered abroad.<WG1287>
So<WG3767> from<WG575> that<WG1565> day<WG2250> forward<WG575> they took counsel<WG4823> that<WG2443> they might put<WG615> him<WG846> to death.<WG615>

Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> walked<WG4043> no<WG3756> more<WG2089> openly<WG3954> among<WG1722> the Jews,<WG2453> but<WG235> departed<WG565> from there<WG1564> into<WG1519> the country<WG5561> near<WG1451> the wilderness,<WG2048> to<WG1451> a city<WG4172> called<WG3004> Ephraim.<WG2187> He stayed<WG1304> there<WG2546> with<WG3326> his<WG846> disciples.<WG3101>

Now<WG1161> the Passover<WG3957> of the Jews<WG2453> was<WG2258> at hand.<WG1451> <WG2532> Many<WG4183> went<WG305> up<WG1537> from the country<WG5561> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414> before<WG4253> the Passover,<WG3957> to<WG2443> purify<WG48> themselves.<WG1438>

Then<WG3767> they<WG2212> sought for Jesus<WG2424> and<WG2532> spoke<WG3004> one with<WG3326> another,<WG240> as they stood<WG2476> in<WG1722> the temple,<WG2411> "What<WG5101> do you<WG5213> think<WG1380> — that<WG3754> he<WG2064> isn't<WG3756> coming<WG2064> to<WG1519> the feast at all?<WG3361>"

Now<WG1161> the<WG2532> chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> had<WG1325> commanded<WG1785> that<WG2443> if<WG1437> anyone<WG5100> knew<WG1097> where<WG4226> he was,<WG2076> he should report<WG3377> it,<WG3704> that they might seize<WG4084> him.<WG846>
